messages.title: We are a strong and united community - I'm not going to let the Tories drive us apart
messages.content: When it comes to Europe I'm not ashamed to say I voted remain. It is now my job to ensure hard-won workplace rights and environmental protections are not lost in the Tories' hard Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Defend and extend the NHS that we all depend on, and save Ealing Hospital
Work with Ealing Council to build the houses we need
Defend education: keeping class sizes low and improve our schools
Keep holding at least twice-weekly surgeries
Never ever take any second job or directorship

issues.brexitEurope: When it comes to Europe I'm not ashamed to say I voted remain.
issues.education: Defend education: keeping class sizes low and improve our schools
issues.environment: ensure hard-won workplace rights and environmental protections are not lost
issues.health: Defend and extend the NHS that we all depend on, and save Ealing Hospital

housing.content: Work with Ealing Council to build the houses we need

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm not going to let the Tories drive us apart
leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Miriam Rice on behalf of Steve Pound at the above address. Printed by Post Print
